attributes.additional_details: The issue regarding child abduction and child abuse and the safety of all our children, we feel that all children should be able to go out and play and go to and from school safe with no worry of your child being in danger of sexual predators or child abductions and for a stronger sentence for convicted sex offenders and the sex offenders that preach their conditions, we need to stand up now for our children and for the safety of everyone else's children!!
attributes.background: Stronger punishment for child predators and something more serious put in place to keep all children safe from child predators/abductions

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all crimes against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467154

Impose mandatory 10-year custodial sentences for all child sexual abuse offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556664

Require child sexual abuse to be reported with penalties for failure to do so: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330478

Require police to tell family and cohabitants of child sex abuse offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330311
